Query #11:
Connected to Database: "schema4"

Running Query:
 select dir_fname, dir_lname
from  director
where dir_id in(
select dir_id 
from movie_direction
where mov_id in(
select mov_id 
from movie_cast 
where role =any( select role 
from movie_cast 
   								where mov_id in(
select  mov_id 
from movie 
where mov_title='movie2'))));

Query Result Set:

------------------------------

dir_fname                     dir_lname                     
actor2                        actor2                        


End of Results
The Size of the Result Set = 1

##############################
